Title: Enacts the accessible electronic information act
Summary: Enacts the accessible electronic information act for blind and disabled persons; creates a new fund in the state finance law; authorizes a not-for-profit entity to administer the program.
LawCode: Add ยง92-j, Pub Serv L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the accessible electronic information act
